subject: World War II (1939-45)
Golf
Espionage
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: During World War II, Congressional Country Club was used as a training ground — for rifle, grenade and mortar practice and commando exercises — for America’s first intelligence agency.
snippet: During World War II, Congressional Country Club was used as a training ground — for rifle, grenade and mortar practice and commando exercises — for America’s first intelligence agency.
